processing.app.syntax

Class PdeTextArea

  • Object
    • Component
      • Container
        • JComponent
          • JEditTextArea
            • PdeTextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable

    public class PdeTextArea
extends JEditTextArea
    Extensions to JEditTextArea to for the PDE. These were moved out of JavaTextArea because they were not Java-specific and would be helpful for other Mode implementations.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • _offsetToX

        public int _offsetToX(int line,
                      int offset)
        Convert a character offset to a horizontal pixel position inside the text area. Overridden to take gutter width into account.
        Overrides:
        _offsetToX in class JEditTextArea
        Parameters:
        line - the 0-based line number
        offset - the character offset (0 is the first character on a line)
        Returns:
        the horizontal position
